snippet: Officials reactivated the state’s 22 firefighting air tankers on Friday, days after one of the aircraft crashed in Yosemite National Park, killing the pilot.
abstract: California officials reactivate state’s 22 firefighting air tankers, days after one of the aircraft crashed in Yosemite National Park, killing pilot.
lead_paragraph: Officials reactivated the state’s 22 firefighting air tankers on Friday, days after one of the aircraft crashed in Yosemite National Park, killing the pilot.

headline.main: California: Firefighting Planes Are Cleared for Work After Crash
headline.print_headline: California: Firefighting Planes Are Cleared for Work After Crash
